Instance.description: A painting style represents a particular type of art a Sim can choose to produce. It is a set of textures each with restrictions on when it becomes available. The player chooses a style through the Recipe Picker, thus to actually appear as a choice to the player a PaintingStyle must have one or more associated recipes (one for each size, for example).

Tunable.name: _display_name
Tunable.description: The style name that will be displayed on the hovertip.

TunableList.name: _textures
TunableList.description: A set of PaintingTextures from which one will be chosen for an artwork created using this PaintingStyle.

TunableTuple.description: A particular painting texture and a weight indicating how often it will be picked from among available textures when this style is used.

Tunable.name: texture
Tunable.description: A particular painting texture to use as part of this style.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The relative likelihood (among available textures) that this one will be chosen.
